testimonials.quote: Rou Hun is a unicorn indeed. Armed with a startup mentality. Not only did he design our application, he assisted us at Richnerstutz by managing our team of developers, Manual frontend testing and occasionally jumped in the code & styles himself.
testimonials.quotee: Michael Freund, Lead innovation @ Richner Stutz

testimonials.quote: Rou Hun is a multi-skilled powerhouse. When I hire him to code the front-end I know I'm saving time on design instructions & decisions. There's no friction in collaboration and he adds extra value to our business and operations this way

toolsMarquee: and freestyling it into oblivion and wow did you watch this till the end? :)
